formattedAddress: 92 Hudson River Greenway, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 92 Hudson River Greenway, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Kevin and the FFA coaches have coached my 2 sons for 5 years.  One son has played with FFA Travel team for the 5 years and now has aged out.  One son will be playing for the High School Team the other son has moved to another travel club with Kevin's encouragement and recommendation.  FFA and Kevin's style of coaching is about team building and the lifestyle you gain from being part of a soccer club .  As well as skill, endurance and strength training.   He is passionate for what he does.   I highly recommend FFA for young players.

originalText.text: After over a decade with kids in soccer, I can honestly say that Coach Kevin is one of the best coaches in NYC. He knows how to motivate and encourage. He does wonders with the team on the field and during games he strategically edges out the opponent. They become better soccer players and better people. He inspires and cares. Can't ask for a better coach and club!

text.text: After over a decade with kids in soccer, I can honestly say that Coach Kevin is one of the best coaches in NYC. He knows how to motivate and encourage. He does wonders with the team on the field and during games he strategically edges out the opponent. They become better soccer players and better people. He inspires and cares. Can't ask for a better coach and club!

originalText.text:
I spent a lot of time interviewing and speaking with head coaches of travel teams. It seemed as though there was a common theme. That was to win at any expense and to become the biggest team in the city. That didn’t sit well with me.
I played at a pretty high level, and I k ow what works and doesn’t. After speaking with Kevin and his staff, I knew immediately that this was the place for my son. I knew he would be treated with care, and taught not only the skills he needed, but the methodology and sportsmanship that went right along with it.
If you are looking for a “home” for your child to learn and grow within the game of soccer, FFA-NYC and Kevin would be my only choice!

originalText.text: This soccer program is one of the best in the city, coach Lue takes the time to focus on teaching the basics. I've had the pleasure of being around FFA for the past 4 years and I've seen the kids gain an incredible amount of confidence in their skills as youth players. I highly recommend parents to check out FFA because the kids will gain tremendous experience in what it takes to work hard and develop a winning attitude. I can't say enough about coach Kevin Lue and his program, he's a great coach and has a gift when it comes to teaching his players on how to grasp the game of soccer at an early age.

originalText.text: Coach Lue is amazing. He has helped me get better: 1) at positioning myself on the field, 2) honing my skills 3) at working with the team to win. Thank you Coach Lue because of you I’m a better person on and off the pitch!
